import React from 'react' import ImageHero from 'assets/images/img-hero.jpg' import ImageHero_Frame from 'assets/images/img-frame-hero.jpg' import IconCities from 'assets/images/icons/icon-cities.svg' import IconTraveler from 'assets/images/icons/icon-traveler.svg' import IconTreasure from 'assets/images/icons/icon-treasure.svg' import Button from 'elements/Button' export default function Hero(props) { return (

Forget The Busy Work,
Get Your Next Vacation

We provide what you need to enjoy your holiday with your family. Time to make new memorable moments.

) }
